CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 27, 1961, pg. A5 reads: "Hollywood Club - The popular Hollywood Social and Literary Club of Clairton, celebrated its 27th anniversary, recently, with a gala affair in club headquarters. Dr. C.C. Bookert, president of the club, is surrounded by some of the club members and five charming young women.  First row, left to right: Miss Sue Goorme, Mrs. Ruth Caldwell, Mrs. Jewell Watts, Van Lucas, Mrs. Vernon Pressley, Tom Smith and Mrs. Helen Ransom.  Back row, left to right: John Solomon, Hillary Luckey, Ernest Starks, Dr. Bookert, Ernest Webb, Harry Pressley, Marbro Bellamy and Lacree Fant. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Three men, and two women, including Helen Ransom wearing dress with v-shaped neckline, seated at bar in Hollywood Social and Literary Club headquarters, Clairton
